question: Which central sector scheme has completed 2 years on February 24th 2021?
explanation:
The Union Agriculture Ministryâ€™s flagship scheme PM Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM KISAN) has completed 2 years on 24th February 2021.
This is a 100% central sector scheme, under which income support of Rs.6000/- per year would be given to farmer families in three instalments. The funds would be directly transferred to the beneficiaries through DBT mode.
